content: I think I'll spend at least half a day at the Deutsches Museum, there's just so much to see and learn. By the way, speaking of my travels, I was just thinking about my solo trip to Europe last summer, where I spent two weeks backpacking through Italy, Switzerland, and Germany. It was such an amazing experience, and I'm so glad I got to visit Munich during that trip. Anyway, back to the Deutsches Museum - are there any restaurants or cafes near the museum that you'd recommend for lunch?
